'''"Maison Cardinalice's Winged Shelf"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Maison Cardinalice's Winged Shelf" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Ash Wood = 16
|sort = Ash Wood
}}
